mapper.select: INSERT INTO `app_order_archive` ( `bid`, `file_time`, `order_num`, `dflag`, `bname`, `airportname`, `airport_id`, `year`, `month`, `day`, `province`, `dayweek`, `sex`, `photo`, `pid`, order_num_back ) SELECT u.id, #{maxTime}, CASE WHEN count(ao.order_id) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE count(ao.order_id) END AS order_num, ao.dtflag, u.`name` AS bname, a.airport_name, a.airport_id, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%Y') AS YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%m') AS MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%d') AS DAY, c.name, WEEKDAY(#{maxTime})+1, u.sex, u.photo, c.CID as pid, CASE WHEN ab.back_order_num IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ab.back_order_num END as order_num_back FROM sys_users u INNER JOIN app_orders ao ON ao.sale_no = u.`code` and DATE_FORMAT(ao.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') =#{maxTime} INNER JOIN sys_airport a ON a.airport_id=ao.airport_id and a.dtflag=0 and a.state=0 inner join sys_city c on a.province=c.CID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id as airport_id, count(card.back_id) as back_order_num FROM `app_card_back` card INNER JOIN `app_orders` ao ON card.order_id = ao.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(card.finish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =#{maxTime} GROUP BY ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id ) ab ON ab.sale_no = u.`code` and ab.airport_id=a.airport_id GROUP BY u.id, u.`name`, a.airport_id, a.airport_name, c.CID, c.`name`

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},'$',pid) as cacheKey, count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) AS pcount, sum(aoa.order_num) AS total, sum(aoa.order_num) / count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) AS avgNum, aoa.pid, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num_back) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num_back) END AS back_order_total, sum(aoa.order_num_back) / count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) as avgNum_back FROM app_order_archive aoa where DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} GROUP BY aoa.pid

select concat(#{currentTime},"$",aoa.pid,'$',aoa.airport_id) as cacheKey, sum(aoa.order_num) AS total, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num_back) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num_back) END AS back_order_total, B.pcount, sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount AS avgNum, sum(aoa.order_num_back) / pcount AS avgNum_back from app_order_archive aoa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sua.airport_id, count(su.id) AS pcount FROM sys_users su INNER JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON su.id = sua.sys_id WHERE su.user_type = 3 GROUP BY sua.airport_id ) B ON aoa.airport_id = B.airport_id where DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} group by aoa.pid,aoa.airport_id
